headline: Cognizant Partners with WRITER to Accelerate Secure AI Adoption for Enterprises
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation (NASDAQ:CTSH) is one of the cheap technology stocks to buy now. On July 30, Cognizant and WRITER, which is a global leader in agentic AI for the enterprise, announced a partnership to accelerate AI-driven transformation for businesses. The partnership aims to help global enterprises, particularly those in highly regulated sectors, deploy […]
